chapters.title: Chapter 21: Embers and Ash
chapters.info: Marthea, p. 336—One of the Shaido Maidens of the Spear. She helped Arrela during her captivity. She chose to stay with the Shaido out of loyalty to her clan, though she strongly disapproved of Sevanna's leadership—particularly her use of wetlanders as slaves. She died during the attack on the Shaido.
